title: Hiroshima.mon.amour.1959.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM
description:
Hiroshima.mon.amour.1959.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM

=======

The first feature from Alain Resnais is one of the most influential films
of all time.
A French actress and a Japanese architect engage in a brief, intense affair
in postwar Hiroshima, their consuming mutual fascination impelling them to
exorcise their own scarred memories of love and suffering.
